price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߡߐ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߥߐ߬ߞߎ߬ߟߐ߬ ߛߌ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߢߌ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߞߴߊ߬ ߞߎ߲߬ߞߏ ߡߊ߬
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
